aka: 馬汀的太平洋島之旅(台)

cast.name: 马丁·克鲁勒斯 Martin Clunes

this_title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific Season 1
trans_title: 马丁·克鲁勒斯：太平洋的群岛 第一季
馬汀的太平洋島之旅(台)
introduction: Inspired by reading a book about the Kon-Tiki expedition, Martin Clunes embarks on an epic ocean-wide adventure in search of the real Pacific. He begins in French Polynesia and ends in the Galapagos Islands.
chinese_title: 马丁·克鲁勒斯：太平洋的群岛 第一季
foreign_title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific Season 1
